title: As the Waves Crash Down
lyrics:
Better toughen up kid, this is war
The wolves are scratching at your door
You can find a way to run or learn to struggle through
Where this all leads is up to you
There's no turning back

Raise your fist, stand proud as the waves crash down

We can die in silence, or we can live out loud as the waves crash down



Yeah it all gets bad then it gets worse

So better hope to hell you're well-rehearsed in the art of standing up

When everyone else kneels

You gotta learn to thrive in these killing fields



There's no turning back

Raise your fist, stand proud as the waves crash down

We can die in silence, or we can live out loud as the waves crash down



Nothing's gonna change on its own

You gotta fight, but you're not alone

You can rise above or lay low

On your mark, get set, let's go



No turning back

Raise your fist, stand proud as the waves crash down

We can die in silence, or we can live out loud as the waves crash down

No turning back

Raise your fist, stand proud as the waves crash down

We can die in silence, or we can live out loud as the waves crash down



As the Waves crash down

Down and down and down and down and down

As the Waves crash down

Down and down and down and down and down

As the Waves crash down

Down and down and down and down and down
